recommendations: Akshat Bansal “Akshay is a smart, high empathy PM. This reflects in his understanding of users as well as his relationship with his team. He is also a natural leader and sets the culture of the team he works with. He brings the pack together and gets the best out of the people he works with. In my interactions, I have always found Akshay to be humble and eager to learn. He will do great work wherever he goes.”

Gautam Prajapati “Akshay is one of the best product managers I've worked with. His understanding of technology combined with his wonderful managerial aptitude makes him the best product person for any engineering team. During my work with him at Grofers, he'd always come up with features that find the right balance between business and are meaningful for engineers in the team. I've done many of the most impactful projects starting from my career with Akshay and I strongly believe he'd be a great asset to any team.”
